title: Canyon De Chelly National Monument: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us              FEDERAL JOBS Visit www.usajobs.gov for current employment opportunities with the National Park Service and other federal agencies.             JOBS FOR YOUTH The Student Conservation Association (SCA) is a great program for high school and college students willing to work in the national parks.  Find out more about this great program at www.thesca.org. The SCA offers a Native American Crew at Canyon de Chelly for high school students each summer. Spend your summer working in the park. Check out the SCA Canyon de Chelly facebook page to get involved!
